test_listings.title: Luxury Oceanfront Villa with Private Beach Access
test_listings.description: Stunning oceanfront villa featuring panoramic Pacific Ocean views, private beach access, and world-class amenities. This architectural masterpiece boasts floor-to-ceiling windows, a gourmet chef's kitchen, infinity pool, and spacious outdoor entertaining areas. Perfect for luxury living and hosting memorable gatherings.

test_listings.title: Modern Downtown Penthouse with City Views
test_listings.description: Spectacular penthouse in the heart of downtown Seattle featuring 360-degree city and mountain views. This ultra-modern unit includes smart home technology, premium finishes, private elevator access, and a rooftop terrace. Walking distance to Pike Place Market, waterfront, and all major attractions.

test_listings.title: Charming Victorian Family Home in Historic District
test_listings.description: Beautifully restored Victorian home in the coveted Haight-Ashbury district. Original hardwood floors, ornate moldings, and period details blend seamlessly with modern updates. Features include a gourmet kitchen, formal dining room, multiple fireplaces, and a private garden. Rich in history and character.

test_listings.title: Contemporary Waterfront Condo with Marina Views
test_listings.description: Stunning high-rise condo offering breathtaking marina and bay views. Features include floor-to-ceiling windows, premium appliances, in-unit laundry, and a private balcony. Building amenities include 24/7 concierge, fitness center, pool, and direct marina access. Prime location in the Gaslamp Quarter.

test_listings.title: Spacious Suburban Family Home with Pool
test_listings.description: Perfect family home in a quiet cul-de-sac featuring an open floor plan, updated kitchen with granite counters, spacious master suite, and a beautiful backyard with swimming pool. Located in top-rated school district with easy access to shopping and parks. Move-in ready!

test_listings.title: Historic Brownstone Apartment in Back Bay
test_listings.description: Elegant brownstone apartment featuring high ceilings, original hardwood floors, decorative fireplace, and period details. Recently renovated kitchen and bathroom while maintaining historic charm. Located on prestigious Commonwealth Avenue, steps from Newbury Street shopping and public transportation.

test_listings.title: Mountain View Ranch Estate with Acreage
test_listings.description: Magnificent ranch estate on 5 pristine acres with unobstructed mountain views. Features include vaulted ceilings, stone fireplace, gourmet kitchen, wine cellar, and multiple outdoor spaces. Property includes horse stables, riding trails, and guest quarters. Ultimate privacy and luxury in nature.

test_listings.title: Modern Loft in Arts District
test_listings.description: Trendy industrial loft in the vibrant RiNo Arts District. Features exposed brick walls, concrete floors, steel beams, and oversized windows. Open concept living with modern kitchen, spacious bedroom loft, and rooftop deck access. Walking distance to galleries, breweries, and restaurants.

test_listings.title: Luxury Lakefront Cabin with Private Dock
test_listings.description: Stunning lakefront cabin offering 150 feet of pristine shoreline and private dock. Features include stone fireplace, vaulted ceilings, wraparound deck, and panoramic lake views from every room. Perfect mountain retreat with world-class skiing and outdoor recreation at your doorstep.

test_listings.title: Elegant Colonial in Prestigious Neighborhood
test_listings.description: Magnificent colonial estate on beautifully landscaped grounds in exclusive Round Hill area. Features include grand foyer, formal living and dining rooms, library, gourmet kitchen, master suite with sitting area, and manicured gardens. Prime location with excellent schools and country club proximity.

test_listings.title: Stylish Studio in SoHo
test_listings.description: Chic studio apartment in the heart of SoHo featuring high ceilings, large windows, hardwood floors, and modern kitchen. Perfect for young professionals seeking luxury living in Manhattan's most fashionable neighborhood. Steps from designer boutiques, art galleries, and world-class dining.

test_listings.title: Beachfront Condo with Gulf Views
test_listings.description: Spectacular beachfront condominium with direct Gulf of Mexico views and private beach access. Features include marble floors, granite counters, stainless appliances, and expansive balcony. Resort-style amenities include tennis court, fitness center, and beach service. Paradise living at its finest.

test_listings.title: Contemporary Townhouse with Rooftop Terrace
test_listings.description: Brand new contemporary townhouse featuring three levels of luxury living. Highlights include gourmet kitchen with waterfall island, master suite with spa bath, and stunning rooftop terrace with city views. Premium location in trendy Shaw neighborhood, steps from restaurants and Metro.

test_listings.title: Charming Cottage with Garden
test_listings.description: Adorable historic cottage in the French Quarter featuring original pine floors, exposed beams, working fireplace, and enchanting garden courtyard. Recently updated kitchen and bathroom while preserving old-world charm. Walking distance to Rainbow Row, King Street shopping, and renowned restaurants.

test_listings.title: Modern Desert Oasis with Pool
test_listings.description: Stunning contemporary home showcasing dramatic desert and mountain views. Features include soaring ceilings, walls of glass, gourmet kitchen, master retreat, and resort-style backyard with infinity pool and spa. Located in guard-gated community with golf course and hiking trail access.

usage_instructions.note: This JSON contains 15 diverse property listings for testing purposes.
usage_instructions.price_note: Prices under $10,000 are monthly rent, prices above are purchase prices
how_to_use: 1. Open Django admin panel at http://localhost:8000/admin/
4. Copy and paste individual property data from this file
5. Upload images manually or use placeholder images
6. Assign to existing realtors from dropdown
geographic_diversity: California (Malibu, San Francisco, San Diego, Lake Tahoe)
